title: Guardian of Self

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: By understanding that, I would explore certain objectivity inside my subjectivity. Either way, I'm the guardian of what someone else can say about me.
dialogue.context: Evan claims sovereignty over his own self-definition and interpretation

scene_context: In a 2-panel format, Evan explores the paradox of finding objectivity within subjectivity and asserts his role as guardian of his own narrative.
philosophical_theme: Self-sovereignty and the authority to define one's own consciousness
visual_elements: Two panels showing the nested relationship between objectivity and subjectivity
